circumstances: Shortly after takeoff from Amman-Marka Airport, the pilot informed ATC about technical problems and received the permission to return for an emergency landing. The pilot completed a circuit and started the descent. With its undercarriage still raised, the aircraft struck the top of a hill located few km short of runway threshold, went out of control and eventually crashed in flames. A passenger was killed and ten others were injured. The aircraft was destroyed by a post crash fire.
